channel.title: The Daily Pratchett
channel.description: A quote from Sir Terry Pratchett every day.

item.description:
"Too many people, when listing all the perils to be found in the search for lost treasure or ancient wisdom, had forgotten to put at the top of the list 'the man who arrived just before you'."

- Terry Pratchett, The Last Hero

""Right, you bastards, you're... you're geography""

- Terry Pratchett, Guards! Guards!

""That statement is either so deep it would take a lifetime to fully comprehend every particle of its meaning, or it is a load of absolute tosh. Which is it, I wonder?""

- Terry Pratchett, Hogfather

""Meat pies! Hot sausages! Inna bun! So fresh the pig h'an't noticed they're gone!""

Genuine pig portion packages - Terry Pratchett, Moving Pictures

"Five exclamation marks, the sure sign of an insane mind."

- Terry Pratchett, Reaper Man
